entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character who is experiencing pain and discomfort. He is described as being ill, vomiting, and having a headache.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is standing over him and looking frightened. He is trying to understand what is happening to Harry's dad.

entities.name: harry's dad
entities.description: A person who has been attacked and bitten, causing serious harm. The exact identity of this person is not specified in the text.

relationships.description: Harry is concerned about Ron's reaction to his news, and Ron is trying to understand what is happening.
Harry informs Ron that his dad has been attacked and bitten. This relationship is bidirectional, as Harry is also informed about the situation with his dad.
Ron is concerned about his dad's well-being and is trying to get help. This relationship is bidirectional, as Ron is also informed about the situation with Harry's dad.
